{{Exclusive|java}}
'''Chat types''' are [[JSON]] files located in [[data pack]]s that allow limited control of [[chat]] message styling.

== JSON format ==
Chat types are stored as [[JSON]] files at the path <code>data/<namespace>/chat_type/<name>.json</code>.

<div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound}} The root object.
** {{nbt|compound|chat}}: Configuration on how the message should be displayed in chat.
*** {{nbt|string|translation_key}}: The [[language]] translation key to use. Can also be plain text with <code>%s</code> insertions.
*** {{nbt|list|parameters}}: The parameters to insert. The length of this list should correspond with the amount of insertions in the translation value.
**** {{nbt|string}}: A parameter. Allowed values: {{cd|sender|target|content|d=and}}.
*** {{nbt|compound|style}}: (Optional) [[Text component]] styles to apply to the whole chat message. Styles on individual parameters are only possible with legacy [[formatting codes]].
** {{nbt|compound|narration}}: Configuration on how the message should be read by the [[narrator]].
*** The same format as '''chat'''.
</div>

== List of chat types ==
{|class="wikitable"
! Chat type
! Source
! Default chat format
! Default narration
|-
| {{cd|chat}}
| A message sent by a player
| <%sender> %content
| %sender says %content
|-
| {{cd|emote_command}}
| A message sent using the {{cmd|me}} command
| colspan=2 | * %sender %content
|-
| {{cd|msg_command_incoming}}
| A received [[Commands/msg|private message]] from a player
| %sender whispers to you: %content
| rowspan=5 | %sender says %content
|-
| {{cd|msg_command_outgoing}}
| The [[Commands/msg|private message]] sent to another player
| You whisper to %target: %content
|-
| {{cd|say_command}}
| The message from a {{cmd|say}} command
| [%sender] %content
|-
| {{cd|team_msg_command_incoming}}
| A received [[Commands/teammsg|team message]] from a player
| %target <%sender> %content
|-
| {{cd|team_msg_command_outgoing}}
| The [[Commands/teammsg|team message]] sent to another player
| -> %target <%sender> %content
|}
